DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the patient preference for a biocompatible thermosensitive solution-gel versus water or saline (liquid) enema.
DOC.brief_title: Localized Therapeutics for the Treatment of Gastrointestinal Disorders
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy Age 18 to 70 years old Nonpregnant GI complaints Pregnancy Patients with previous colonic surgery or current bowel injury or obstruction Allergies to contrast
